content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'refinedsilver_adlsdpastorini_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [refinedsilver_adlsdpastorini_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://refinedsilver@adlsdpastorini.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE cclim.temperatura (
	[time] DATETIME2,
	[latitud] double,
	[longitud] double,
	[Ts_Valor] double,
	[CodigoNacional] nvarchar(10),
	[nombreEstacion] nvarchar(50)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'parquet_climatico/temperatura/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [refinedsilver_adlsdpastorini_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM cclim.temperatura
GO
